QAData.question: Who won between Chelsea and West Ham United on Sun, 24 Apr 2022 13:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Chelsea won 1–0 over West Ham United on Sun, 24 Apr 2022 13:00:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Thiago Silva completed the most passes (110) in the match.
Craig Dawson committed a foul leading to a penalty for Chelsea.
N'Golo Kanté was Player of the Match with a rating of 8.
Timo Werner is the most accurate passer (96%) in the match.
Ruben Loftus-Cheek completed the most dribbles (3) in the match.
Ruben Loftus-Cheek created the most chances (4) in the match.
Ruben Loftus-Cheek won the most duels (7) in the match.
Mason Mount lost the most duels (7) in the match.
Ben Johnson has the least touches (36) of any outfield player.
